# üçí Cherry Studio Cherry Studio est un client de bureau prenant en charge de multiples fournisseurs LLM, disponible sur Windows, Mac et Linux. üëè Rejoignez [Groupe Telegram](https://t.me/CherryStudioAI)ÔΩú[Discord](https://discord.gg/wez8HtpxqQ) | [Groupe QQ(575014769)](https://qm.qq.com/q/lo0D4qVZKi) ‚ù§Ô∏è Vous aimez Cherry Studio ? Donnez-lui une √©toile üåü ou [Devenez Sponsor](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CherryHQ/cherry-studio/main/docs/sponsor.md) pour soutenir le d√©veloppement ! # üå† Capture d'√©cran ![](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/36dddb2c-e0fb-4a5f-9411-91447bab6e18) ![](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f549e8a0-2385-40b4-b52b-2039e39f2930) ![](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/58e0237c-4d36-40de-b428-53051d982026) # üåü Fonctionnalit√©s cl√©s 1. **Support de divers fournisseurs LLM** : - ‚òÅÔ∏è Services cloud LLM majeurs : OpenAI, Gemini, Anthropic, et plus encore - üîó Int√©gration de services web IA : Claude, Peplexity, Poe, et autres - üíª Prise en charge des mod√®les locaux avec Ollama, LM Studio 2. **Assistants IA & Conversations** : - üìö Plus de 300 assistants IA pr√©configur√©s - ü§ñ Cr√©ation d'assistants personnalis√©s - üí¨ Conversations simultan√©es multi-mod√®les 3. **Traitement de documents & donn√©es** : - üìÑ Prise en charge du texte, des images, Office, PDF, et plus encore - ‚òÅÔ∏è Gestion et sauvegarde de fichiers WebDAV - üìä Visualisation de graphiques Mermaid - üíª Surlignage de la syntaxe du code

# üìù Roadmap

We're actively working on the following features and improvements:

1. üéØ **Core Features**

- Selection Assistant with smart content selection enhancement
- Deep Research with advanced research capabilities
- Memory System with global context awareness
- Document Preprocessing with improved document handling
- MCP Marketplace for Model Context Protocol ecosystem

2. üóÇ **Knowledge Management**

- Notes and Collections
- Dynamic Canvas visualization
- OCR capabilities
- TTS (Text-to-Speech) support

3. üì± **Platform Support**

- HarmonyOS Edition (PC)
- Android App (Phase 1)
- iOS App (Phase 1)
- Multi-Window support
- Window Pinning functionality

4. üîå **Advanced Features**

- Plugin System
- ASR (Automatic Speech Recognition)
- Assistant and Topic Interaction Refactoring

Track our progress and contribute on our [project board](https://github.com/orgs/CherryHQ/projects/7).

Want to influence our roadmap? Join our [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/CherryHQ/cherry-studio/discussions) to share your ideas and feedback!

# ü§ù Contributing

We welcome contributions to Cherry Studio! Here are some ways you can contribute:

1. **Contribute Code**: Develop new features or optimize existing code.
2. **Fix Bugs**: Submit fixes for any bugs you find.
3. **Maintain Issues**: Help manage GitHub issues.
4. **Product Design**: Participate in design discussions.
5. **Write Documentation**: Improve user manuals and guides.
6. **Community Engagement**: Join discussions and help users.
7. **Promote Usage**: Spread the word about Cherry Studio.

Refer to the [Branching Strategy](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CherryHQ/cherry-studio/main/docs/branching-strategy-en.md) for contribution guidelines

## Getting Started

1. **Fork the Repository**: Fork and clone it to your local machine.
2. **Create a Branch**: For your changes.
3. **Submit Changes**: Commit and push your changes.
4. **Open a Pull Request**: Describe your changes and reasons.

For more detailed guidelines, please refer to our [Contributing Guide](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CherryHQ/cherry-studio/main/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Thank you for your support and contributions!

# üîß Developer Co-creation Program

We are launching the Cherry Studio Developer Co-creation Program to foster a healthy and positive-feedback loop within the open-source ecosystem. We believe that great software is built collaboratively, and every merged pull request breathes new life into the project.

We sincerely invite you to join our ranks of contributors and shape the future of Cherry Studio with us.

## Contributor Rewards Program

To give back to our core contributors and create a virtuous cycle, we have established the following long-term incentive plan.

**The inaugural tracking period for this program will be Q3 2025 (July, August, September). Rewards for this cycle will be distributed on October 1st.**

# ü§ù Contribuer

Nous accueillons toutes les contributions √† Cherry Studio ! Voici comment vous pouvez aider :

1. **Contribuer au code** : D√©veloppez de nouvelles fonctionnalit√©s ou optimisez le code existant.
2. **Corriger des bugs** : Proposez des corrections pour les bugs que vous trouvez.
3. **G√©rer les tickets** : Aidez √† g√©rer les tickets GitHub.
4. **Conception produit** : Participez aux discussions sur le design.
5. **R√©diger la documentation** : Am√©liorez les manuels et guides utilisateur.
6. **Engagement communautaire** : Rejoignez les discussions et aidez les utilisateurs.
7. **Promotion** : Faites conna√Ætre Cherry Studio.

Consultez la [strat√©gie de branchement](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CherryHQ/cherry-studio/main/docs/branching-strategy-en.md) pour les r√®gles de contribution

## Pour commencer

1. **Forkez le d√©p√¥t** : Forkez et clonez-le sur votre machine locale.
2. **Cr√©ez une branche** : Pour vos modifications.
3. **Soumettez vos modifications** : Commitez et poussez vos changements.
4. **Ouvrez une pull request** : D√©crivez vos modifications et leurs raisons.

Pour plus de d√©tails, veuillez consulter notre [Guide du contributeur](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CherryHQ/cherry-studio/main/CONTRIBUTING.md).

Merci pour votre soutien et vos contributions !

# üîß Programme de co-cr√©ation d√©veloppeur

Nous lan√ßons le programme de co-cr√©ation d√©veloppeur Cherry Studio afin de favoriser une boucle saine et vertueuse dans l‚Äô√©cosyst√®me open-source. Nous croyons que le meilleur logiciel se construit en collaboration, et chaque pull request fusionn√©e insuffle une nouvelle vie au projet.

Nous vous invitons sinc√®rement √† rejoindre nos contributeurs et √† fa√ßonner l‚Äôavenir de Cherry Studio avec nous.

## Programme de r√©compense des contributeurs

Pour remercier nos contributeurs principaux et encourager un cercle vertueux, nous avons √©tabli le plan d‚Äôincitation √† long terme suivant.

**La premi√®re p√©riode de suivi de ce programme sera le T3 2025 (juillet, ao√ªt, septembre). Les r√©compenses de ce cycle seront distribu√©es le 1er octobre.**

Content:
Within any tracking period (e.g., July 1st to September 30th for the first cycle), any developer who contributes more than **30 meaningful commits** to any of Cherry Studio's open-source projects on GitHub will be eligible for the following benefits: - **Cursor Subscription Sponsorship**: Receive a **$70 USD** credit or reimbursement for your [Cursor](https://cursor.sh/) subscription, making AI your most efficient coding partner. - **Unlimited Model Access**: Get **unlimited** API calls for the **DeepSeek** and **Qwen** models. - **Cutting-Edge Tech Access**: Enjoy occasional perks, including API access to models like **Claude**, **Gemini**, and **OpenAI**, keeping you at the forefront of technology. ## Growing Together & Future Plans A vibrant community is the driving force behind any sustainable open-source project. As Cherry Studio grows, so will our rewards program. We are committed to continuously aligning our benefits with the best-in-class tools and resources in the industry. This ensures our core contributors receive meaningful support, creating a positive cycle where developers, the community, and the project grow together. **Moving forward, the project will also embrace an increasingly open stance to give back to the entire open-source community.** ## How to Get Started? We look forward to your first Pull Request! You can start by exploring our repositories, picking up a `good first issue`, or proposing your own enhancements. Every commit is a testament to the spirit of open source. Thank you for your interest and contributions. Let's build together. # üè¢ Enterprise Edition Building on the Community Edition, we are proud to introduce **Cherry Studio Enterprise Edition**‚Äîa privately-deployable AI productivity and management platform designed for modern teams and enterprises. The Enterprise Edition addresses core challenges in team collaboration by centralizing the management of AI resources, knowledge, and data. It empowers organizations to enhance efficiency, foster innovation, and ensure compliance, all while maintaining 100% control over their data in a secure environment. ## Core Advantages - **Unified Model Management**: Centrally integrate and manage various cloud-based LLMs (e.g., OpenAI, Anthropic, Google Gemini) and locally deployed private models. Employees can use them out-of-the-box without individual configuration. - **Enterprise-Grade Knowledge Base**: Build, manage, and share team-wide knowledge bases. Ensures knowledge retention and consistency, enabling team members to interact with AI based on unified and accurate information. - **Fine-Grained Access Control**: Easily manage employee accounts and assign role-based permissions for different models, knowledge bases, and features through a unified admin backend. - **Fully Private Deployment**: Deploy the entire backend service on your on-premises servers or private cloud, ensuring your data remains 100% private and under your control to meet the strictest security and compliance standards. - **Reliable Backend Services**: Provides stable API services and enterprise-grade data backup and recovery mechanisms to ensure business continuity. ## ‚ú® Online Demo > üöß **Public Beta Notice** > > The Enterprise Edition is currently in its early public beta stage, and we are actively iterating and optimizing its features. We are aware that it may not be perfectly stable yet. If you encounter any issues or have valuable suggestions during your trial, we would be very grateful if you could contact us via email to provide feedback. **üîó [Cherry Studio Enterprise](https://www.cherry-ai.com/enterprise)** ## Version Comparison | Feature | Community Edition | Enterprise Edition | | :---------------- | :----------------------------------------- | :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **Open Source** | ‚úÖ Yes | ‚≠ïÔ∏è Partially released to customers | | **Cost** | Free for Personal Use / Commercial License | Buyout / Subscription Fee | | **Admin Backend** | ‚Äî | ‚óè Centralized **Model** Access
‚óè **Employee** Management
‚óè Shared **Knowledge Base**
‚óè **Access** Control
‚óè **Data** Backup | | **Server** | ‚Äî | ‚úÖ Dedicated Private Deployment | ## Get the Enterprise Edition We believe the Enterprise Edition will become your team's AI productivity engine. If you are interested in Cherry Studio Enterprise Edition and would like to learn more, request a quote, or schedule a demo, please feel free to contact us. - **For Business Inquiries & Purchasing**: **üìß [bd@cherry-ai.com](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CherryHQ/cherry-studio/main/mailto:bd@cherry-ai.com)** # üîó Related Projects - [one-api](https://github.com/songquanpeng/one-api): LLM API management and distribution system supporting mainstream models like OpenAI, Azure, and Anthropic. Features a unified API interface, suitable for key management and secondary distribution. - [ublacklist](https://github.com/iorate/ublacklist): Blocks specific sites from appearing in Google search results # üöÄ Contributors

Au cours de toute p√©riode de suivi (par exemple, du 1er juillet au 30 septembre pour le premier cycle), tout d√©veloppeur qui contribue plus de **30 commits significatifs** √† l‚Äôun des projets open source de Cherry Studio sur GitHub sera √©ligible aux avantages suivants : - **Parrainage d‚Äôabonnement Cursor** : Recevez un cr√©dit ou un remboursement de **70 $ USD** pour votre abonnement [Cursor](https://cursor.sh/), afin de faire de l‚ÄôIA votre partenaire de codage le plus efficace. - **Acc√®s illimit√© aux mod√®les** : B√©n√©ficiez d‚Äôappels API **illimit√©s** pour les mod√®les **DeepSeek** et **Qwen**. - **Acc√®s aux technologies de pointe** : Profitez occasionnellement d‚Äôavantages, tels qu‚Äôun acc√®s API √† des mod√®les comme **Claude**, **Gemini** et **OpenAI**, pour rester √† la pointe de la technologie. ## Grandir Ensemble & Plans Futurs Une communaut√© dynamique est la force motrice derri√®re tout projet open source durable. √Ä mesure que Cherry Studio grandit, notre programme de r√©compenses √©voluera √©galement. Nous nous engageons √† aligner continuellement nos avantages sur les meilleurs outils et ressources du secteur. Cela garantit √† nos contributeurs principaux un soutien significatif, cr√©ant un cercle vertueux o√π les d√©veloppeurs, la communaut√© et le projet grandissent ensemble. **√Ä l‚Äôavenir, le projet adoptera √©galement une posture encore plus ouverte pour redonner √† l‚Äôensemble de la communaut√© open source.** ## Comment commencer ? Nous attendons avec impatience votre premi√®re Pull Request ! Vous pouvez commencer par explorer nos d√©p√¥ts, choisir une `good first issue`, ou proposer vos propres am√©liorations. Chaque commit est un t√©moignage de l‚Äôesprit open source. Merci pour votre int√©r√™t et vos contributions. Construisons ensemble. # üè¢ √âdition Entreprise En s‚Äôappuyant sur l‚Äô√âdition Communautaire, nous sommes fiers de pr√©senter **Cherry Studio Enterprise Edition**‚Äîune plateforme de productivit√© et de gestion IA d√©ployable en priv√©, con√ßue pour les √©quipes et entreprises modernes. L‚Äô√âdition Entreprise r√©pond aux principaux d√©fis de la collaboration en √©quipe en centralisant la gestion des ressources IA, des connaissances et des donn√©es. Elle permet aux organisations d‚Äôam√©liorer l‚Äôefficacit√©, de favoriser l‚Äôinnovation et d‚Äôassurer la conformit√©, tout en gardant un contr√¥le total sur leurs donn√©es dans un environnement s√©curis√©. ## Avantages Cl√©s - **Gestion unifi√©e des mod√®les** : Int√©grez et g√©rez de mani√®re centralis√©e divers LLM cloud (ex : OpenAI, Anthropic, Google Gemini) et des mod√®les priv√©s d√©ploy√©s localement. Les employ√©s peuvent les utiliser imm√©diatement sans configuration individuelle. - **Base de connaissances de niveau entreprise** : Construisez, g√©rez et partagez des bases de connaissances √† l‚Äô√©chelle de l‚Äô√©quipe. Garantit la r√©tention et la coh√©rence des connaissances, permettant aux membres d‚Äôinteragir avec l‚ÄôIA sur la base d‚Äôinformations unifi√©es et fiables. - **Contr√¥le d‚Äôacc√®s granulaire** : G√©rez facilement les comptes employ√©s et attribuez des autorisations bas√©es sur les r√¥les pour diff√©rents mod√®les, bases de connaissances et fonctionnalit√©s via un back-office unifi√©. - **D√©ploiement enti√®rement priv√©** : D√©ployez tout le service backend sur vos serveurs locaux ou cloud priv√©, assurant la confidentialit√© totale de vos donn√©es pour r√©pondre aux normes de s√©curit√© et de conformit√© les plus strictes. - **Services backend fiables** : Fournit des services API stables et des m√©canismes de sauvegarde/r√©cup√©ration de donn√©es de niveau entreprise pour garantir la continuit√© d‚Äôactivit√©. ## ‚ú® D√©mo en ligne > üöß **Avis de B√™ta Publique** > > L‚Äô√âdition Entreprise est actuellement en phase de b√™ta publique pr√©coce et nous it√©rons et optimisons activement ses fonctionnalit√©s. Nous savons qu‚Äôelle n‚Äôest pas encore parfaitement stable. Si vous rencontrez des probl√®mes ou avez des suggestions lors de l‚Äôessai, nous vous serions tr√®s reconnaissants de nous contacter par email pour nous faire part de vos retours. **üîó [Cherry Studio Enterprise](https://www.cherry-ai.com/enterprise)** ## Comparaison des versions | Fonctionnalit√© | √âdition Communautaire | √âdition Entreprise | | :---------------- | :----------------------------------------- | :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | **Open Source** | ‚úÖ Oui | ‚≠ïÔ∏è Partiellement publi√© pour les clients | | **Co√ªt** | Gratuit pour usage perso / Licence pro | Achat complet / Abonnement | | **Admin Backend** | ‚Äî | ‚óè Acc√®s **mod√®les** centralis√©

RowTranslations.originContent: Within any tracking period (e.g., July 1st to September 30th for the first cycle), any developer who contributes more than **30 meaningful commits** to any of Cherry Studio's open-source projects on GitHub will be eligible for the following benefits:
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Au cours de toute p√©riode de suivi (par exemple, du 1er juillet au 30 septembre pour le premier cycle), tout d√©veloppeur qui contribue plus de **30 commits significatifs** √† l‚Äôun des projets open source de Cherry Studio sur GitHub sera √©ligible aux avantages suivants :

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Cursor Subscription Sponsorship**: Receive a **$70 USD** credit or reimbursement for your [Cursor](https://cursor.sh/) subscription, making AI your most efficient coding partner.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **Parrainage d‚Äôabonnement Cursor** : Recevez un cr√©dit ou un remboursement de **70 $ USD** pour votre abonnement [Cursor](https://cursor.sh/), afin de faire de l‚ÄôIA votre partenaire de codage le plus efficace.

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Unlimited Model Access**: Get **unlimited** API calls for the **DeepSeek** and **Qwen** models.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **Acc√®s illimit√© aux mod√®les** : B√©n√©ficiez d‚Äôappels API **illimit√©s** pour les mod√®les **DeepSeek** et **Qwen**.

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Cutting-Edge Tech Access**: Enjoy occasional perks, including API access to models like **Claude**, **Gemini**, and **OpenAI**, keeping you at the forefront of technology.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **Acc√®s aux technologies de pointe** : Profitez occasionnellement d‚Äôavantages, tels qu‚Äôun acc√®s API √† des mod√®les comme **Claude**, **Gemini** et **OpenAI**, pour rester √† la pointe de la technologie.

RowTranslations.originContent: A vibrant community is the driving force behind any sustainable open-source project. As Cherry Studio grows, so will our rewards program. We are committed to continuously aligning our benefits with the best-in-class tools and resources in the industry. This ensures our core contributors receive meaningful support, creating a positive cycle where developers, the community, and the project grow together.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Une communaut√© dynamique est la force motrice derri√®re tout projet open source durable. √Ä mesure que Cherry Studio grandit, notre programme de r√©compenses √©voluera √©galement. Nous nous engageons √† aligner continuellement nos avantages sur les meilleurs outils et ressources du secteur. Cela garantit √† nos contributeurs principaux un soutien significatif, cr√©ant un cercle vertueux o√π les d√©veloppeurs, la communaut√© et le projet grandissent ensemble.

RowTranslations.originContent: **Moving forward, the project will also embrace an increasingly open stance to give back to the entire open-source community.**
RowTranslations.translatedContent: **√Ä l‚Äôavenir, le projet adoptera √©galement une posture encore plus ouverte pour redonner √† l‚Äôensemble de la communaut√© open source.**

RowTranslations.originContent: We look forward to your first Pull Request!
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Nous attendons avec impatience votre premi√®re Pull Request !

RowTranslations.originContent: You can start by exploring our repositories, picking up a `good first issue`, or proposing your own enhancements. Every commit is a testament to the spirit of open source.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Vous pouvez commencer par explorer nos d√©p√¥ts, choisir une `good first issue`, ou proposer vos propres am√©liorations. Chaque commit est un t√©moignage de l‚Äôesprit open source.

RowTranslations.originContent: Thank you for your interest and contributions.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: Merci pour votre int√©r√™t et vos contributions.

RowTranslations.originContent: Building on the Community Edition, we are proud to introduce **Cherry Studio Enterprise Edition**‚Äîa privately-deployable AI productivity and management platform designed for modern teams and enterprises.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: En s‚Äôappuyant sur l‚Äô√âdition Communautaire, nous sommes fiers de pr√©senter **Cherry Studio Enterprise Edition**‚Äîune plateforme de productivit√© et de gestion IA d√©ployable en priv√©, con√ßue pour les √©quipes et entreprises modernes.

RowTranslations.originContent: The Enterprise Edition addresses core challenges in team collaboration by centralizing the management of AI resources, knowledge, and data. It empowers organizations to enhance efficiency, foster innovation, and ensure compliance, all while maintaining 100% control over their data in a secure environment.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: L‚Äô√âdition Entreprise r√©pond aux principaux d√©fis de la collaboration en √©quipe en centralisant la gestion des ressources IA, des connaissances et des donn√©es. Elle permet aux organisations d‚Äôam√©liorer l‚Äôefficacit√©, de favoriser l‚Äôinnovation et d‚Äôassurer la conformit√©, tout en gardant un contr√¥le total sur leurs donn√©es dans un environnement s√©curis√©.

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Unified Model Management**: Centrally integrate and manage various cloud-based LLMs (e.g., OpenAI, Anthropic, Google Gemini) and locally deployed private models. Employees can use them out-of-the-box without individual configuration.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **Gestion unifi√©e des mod√®les** : Int√©grez et g√©rez de mani√®re centralis√©e divers LLM cloud (ex : OpenAI, Anthropic, Google Gemini) et des mod√®les priv√©s d√©ploy√©s localement. Les employ√©s peuvent les utiliser imm√©diatement sans configuration individuelle.

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Enterprise-Grade Knowledge Base**: Build, manage, and share team-wide knowledge bases. Ensures knowledge retention and consistency, enabling team members to interact with AI based on unified and accurate information.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **Base de connaissances de niveau entreprise** : Construisez, g√©rez et partagez des bases de connaissances √† l‚Äô√©chelle de l‚Äô√©quipe. Garantit la r√©tention et la coh√©rence des connaissances, permettant aux membres d‚Äôinteragir avec l‚ÄôIA sur la base d‚Äôinformations unifi√©es et fiables.

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Fine-Grained Access Control**: Easily manage employee accounts and assign role-based permissions for different models, knowledge bases, and features through a unified admin backend.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **Contr√¥le d‚Äôacc√®s granulaire** : G√©rez facilement les comptes employ√©s et attribuez des autorisations bas√©es sur les r√¥les pour diff√©rents mod√®les, bases de connaissances et fonctionnalit√©s via un back-office unifi√©.

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Fully Private Deployment**: Deploy the entire backend service on your on-premises servers or private cloud, ensuring your data remains 100% private and under your control to meet the strictest security and compliance standards.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **D√©ploiement enti√®rement priv√©** : D√©ployez tout le service backend sur vos serveurs locaux ou cloud priv√©, assurant la confidentialit√© totale de vos donn√©es pour r√©pondre aux normes de s√©curit√© et de conformit√© les plus strictes.

RowTranslations.originContent: - **Reliable Backend Services**: Provides stable API services and enterprise-grade data backup and recovery mechanisms to ensure business continuity.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - **Services backend fiables** : Fournit des services API stables et des m√©canismes de sauvegarde/r√©cup√©ration de donn√©es de niveau entreprise pour garantir la continuit√© d‚Äôactivit√©.

RowTranslations.originContent: > The Enterprise Edition is currently in its early public beta stage, and we are actively iterating and optimizing its features. We are aware that it may not be perfectly stable yet. If you encounter any issues or have valuable suggestions during your trial, we would be very grateful if you could contact us via email to provide feedback.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: > L‚Äô√âdition Entreprise est actuellement en phase de b√™ta publique pr√©coce et nous it√©rons et optimisons activement ses fonctionnalit√©s. Nous savons qu‚Äôelle n‚Äôest pas encore parfaitement stable. Si vous rencontrez des probl√®mes ou avez des suggestions lors de l‚Äôessai, nous vous serions tr√®s reconnaissants de nous contacter par email pour nous faire part de vos retours.
